item.title: The Process of Self-Revelation
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Today, I gobbled down two chicken-halves and some mashed potatoes. That was a lot. The other time I was still hungry after a single half, and this time around I was stressing out over barely finishing the meal. I needed to sit down for a bit. I picked a sunny spot. Me being me I took some time to meditate and suddenly I had an epiphany: “We are afraid of ourselves, and that is what life is.". Believe me, this was not the chicken talk, but I had finally figured something out. Let me elaborateâ€¦

item.title: What do we know about who we want to be?
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: It is pretty important for each of us to be the person we want to be. For survival, for society, for integrity. But what do we know then about who we want to be?
